publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: A playne demonstration of Iohn Frithes lacke of witte and learnynge in his vnderstandynge of holie scripture : and of the olde holy doctours, in the blessed sacrament of the aulter, newly set foorthe by Iohn Gwynneth clerke
monogr.author: Gwynneth, John

div.p: IT is to be noted that where I dooe not recite the woordes of Frythe, nor any of his allegacions, but that I showe in what leafe of his booke, the reader maie fynde it, ye shall vnderstande, that I meane it of his booke whiche is of the first printe, bearinge date Anno Domini 1533. for his booke of any other later prynte (which I haue hearde of and not seene) maie chaunce to varie from the fyrste, in the numbre of leaues. And so by reason of that, it might peraduenture be thought, that other (I saie) not truely of him, or els of the places, where I report him to saie, as he dothe. In auoydinge wherof I haue thought it good to geue this knowledge therof before.
